scenarios.name: Header UI Theme Get completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Header UI Theme Get operations
scenarios.when: a valid Header UI Theme Get request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Header UI Theme Get handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Header UI Theme Get operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Header UI Theme Get records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Header UI Theme Get
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
